name: SpaceLander
description:
Can you land the SpaceLander?

Inspired by the 1970s arcade classic 'Lunar Lander', the goal of 'SpaceLander' is the same: to land in one piece. 

You know that there is a landing pad somewhere up ahead. But just how far away is it? And how many times will you die before you get there?

MOBILE CONTROLS: your screen is the control button. Swipe and hold – anywhere on screen – to apply thrust in that direction. Release touch to cut thrusters, and drift...

KEYBOARD CONTROLS: if playing on desktop you can control the SpaceLander's directional thrusters using the arrow keys (⬆️, ⬇️, ⬅️, ➡️) or Vim keys (H, J, K, L).

FUEL CONSUMPTION: you will burn the most fuel when braking and accelerating, so plan ahead and use your fuel wisely.

_____________________________________________

An iOS and Android mobile version of the game is in development. The web version will remain playable and free permanently.
